ability: 【A】[②]When this card is placed in waiting room from stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 「勇者アルマース」, show it to your opponent and place it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
【A】 BOND／「殺りくマッスィーン サファイア」 ［①］ (When you place this card on stage from hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 「殺りくマッスィーン サファイア」 from your waiting room and place it into your hand)

name: ピンポンダッシュ”アクターレ
flavor_text:
嵐のようなピンポンダッシュとイタズラ電話で
眠れなくしてやる！
ability: 【S】［① Place this card in waiting room］Your opponent returns call the cards in waiting room to deck. Shuffle the deck afterwards.

name: 珍妙なカエル ティンク
flavor_text: あれれ？　ぼくは、いったい何を･･････？
ability: 【C】If there are 4 or more climax in your waiting rooom, this card gets +2000 Power.
【S】［③ Place this card into the waiting room］Choose 1 of your opponent's front row level 2 or below characters, place it on top of the deck.

name: 殺りくマッスィーン サファイア
flavor_text: やられる前に殺る、というわけじゃ
ability: 【C】 If you have another character with 「アルマース」 in its name, this card gets +1500 Power.
【A】 When the character battling this card becomes REVERSE, if 「新婚女王」 is in the climax slot, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card from hand, discard it to waiting room.

name: 隠密凶師チャンプル先生
flavor_text: 強く激しきココロこそが、食材のココロをも動かす真の調味料ぞなッ！！
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on stage from hand, you may choose 1 climax from your opponent's waiting room, return it to deck. If you do, shuffle the deck, during this turn, this card gains the following ability. 『【A】When the character battling this card becomes REVERSE, you may draw 1 card.』

name: 意地っ張りロザリー
flavor_text: 戦いなど身分卑しき者のすること！
ability: 【C】During your opponent's turn, all your other 《悪魔》 characters get +1000 Power.
【A】When this card is placed on stage from hand, if there are no climax in your opponent's waiting room, draw 1 card, choose 1 card from hand, discard to waiting room.

name: くの一 雪丸
flavor_text:

全身全霊をもって戦う所存にゴザル！
ability: 【S】● ASSIST 1500 Level 1 ［Discard this card from hand to Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 Character being Front Attacked, during this turn, it gets +1500 Power)
